data.title: Technologically illiterate MP who masterminded UK porn blocker get hacked, threatens reporter for writing about it
David Cameron's "porn advisor" website hacked - her reaction is to libel and threaten the journalist reporting the story.

Canadian citizen and smoke shop owner targeted by police immediately after opening his shop, falsely arrested for non-existent drug sale, his own surveillance video shows police informant planting vials of cocaine. He is now considering lawsuit.
Edward Snowden's fear of flying is justified; America has history when it comes to forcing down planes in defiance of international law
Member of Russian female punk group Pussy Riot loses her appeal for parole after nearly a year in prison for performing a protest song against President Putin in a Moscow cathedral
Yemeni girl's speech against child marriage goes viral - Eleven year-old says she escaped forced marriage by fleeing her parents.
All internet pornography should be preemptively blocked in Canada, says Conservative MP Joy Smith of Winnipeg
US colonel caught smuggling carved ivory from Kenya
Spain high-speed train crashes near Santiago de Compostela
Iran invites Snowden to visit and "elaborate" on U.S. spying practices
